entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 5 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 40%
